name: Jalapeño Popper Mac & Cheese
description: A one-pot meal with the flavours of a popular restaurant appetizer!
preparation: In Multipurpose or Round Steamer, add pasta and water. Cover and microwave on high 10–12 min, or until tender. Meanwhile, slice jalapeños in half, lengthwise. Remove and discard seeds and pith. Finely dice jalapeños. Once pasta is cooked, strain and set aside.
In same (unwashed) steamer, add chicken. Cover and microwave on high 4–5 min, or until cooked through. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks. Carefully drain liquid from steamer.
Add cooked pasta, jalapeños, seasoning, milk, and cream cheese to steamer. Stir until evenly mixed.
tips: Like it extra spicy? Don’t remove the seeds and pith from the jalapeños.
For a baked mac & cheese, top prepared dish with Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix. Bake at 425° F 5 min, or until top is golden.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup veggies, your choice.
